author: Ahmed Sadek
text: You are welcome to Egypt dm me to arrange your trip and have nice trip

author: Berber DreamTours
text: You are welcome to Morocco üá≤üá¶

author: Victor Jerome Orota
text: It works and it was fantasticüòäüòä
notes: positive outcome from finding a travel partner

author: Linda Jones Stone
text: I get a lot of people say they're interested in traveling but don't contact me or follow up.

author: Sonia Hayat
text: I haven't found anyone reason i am looking for a female to travel. I prefer only travelling with females It feels safer to me but still i couldn't find one.

author: Natasha Ryzhaya
text: I found a female buddy but by looking into chats and communities from my home country, already feels safer with a 'baseline' of understanding. Haven't gone yet, but so far very reliable communication and easy going.

author: Valter Orlic
text: Well I created post in few groups about my trip in Thailand and Vietnam, asked if someone wants to meet or explore with me... men mostly ask if I'm gay for some reason hahaha.

author: Stephen Andrews
text: Would love a travel partner.. so far no takers. ‚òπÔ∏è

author: Baji Darbari-Surti
text: For the most part, and especially for the men, this group is an euphemism for seeking hookups.

author: JJ JJ
text: Join FIND A TRAVEL BUDDY Community https://chat.whatsapp.com/EVKhKwxVQHxGsegaQIjuwE

author: Prince Chaudhary
text: I'm actually helping people streamline this process. Drop me a message or reach out at info@tripastu.com if you're looking for travel networking tips.

author: Sushma Bansal
text: How much this trip cost

author: Pauli Cros
text: Trust I think who do you trust

author: Andy Scheffler
text: I often prefer traveling alone, but i like this group to keep options open, share tips... A few years ago, I met up with someone from a Hawaii group... it worked out wonderfully and we ended up doing a few more things together that week too!

author: Kristine Brooke
text: I much prefer going solo but I have been with a couple of from the group. If i like their profile and if we chat for a few days then always FaceTime first and if you want to travel together I go for it.

author: Anjela Oustian
text: When you travel with strangers, you have to understand, it's practically traveling alone just sharing room for saving on expenses... Shared a cruise for 14 days.

author: Gandos Jos
text: Hello everyone, does anyone want to go to Java Island, Indonesia? To see Mount Bromo, tea plantations, Tumpak Sewu waterfall, and Ijen crater.

author: Aleksandar Mijailovic
text: If you do plan on traveling solo nothing is better than using our whatsapp group where we help people logistically no matter their location in Montenegro

author: Izzal Daniel
text: I tried both but most the time solo. and I enjoyed both but depends on your goal and how you and your travel partner aka stranger manage expectations and expenses.
notes: nuanced take on solo vs partner

author: Inna Gladkov
text: I met my friends in Turkey and Egypt that were locals and showed me around their local places we still keep in contact

author: Sasnuhy Paskevichyan
text: I dont even know why I'm in this group I prefer traveling solo most of the time, or with someone I really know well, because I am suuuper picky and specific with my time and energy lol.

author: Hamza Saif
text: I've done solo travel to 5 countries so far, and I've honestly loved the independence and freedom it gives. But lately I've been thinking... the right travel partner with matching vibes can make the experience even more special...
notes: solo but open to matching vibes

author: Faisal Bin M Alali
text: Mostly fake profiles and need money to come with üòÇ
notes: concern about fake profiles / money scams

author: Malik Blikky
text: I've been traveling solo on and off for a while now. It's actually pretty nice, you get a lot of freedom and space for yourself... When I spent two weeks in Gran Canaria, I quickly met some locals who showed me around and gave me great tips... Still, I believe traveling is more fun when you have someone with you.

author: Sarah Howes
text: I've had two successful holidays with ladies met on here. Not that I've seen them since, but we both enjoyed our holidays together.

author: Danny Gonzalez
text: Not from this particular group but yup I've met tons of people from different travel groups in countries all over the world
notes: has met many via other groups
